summary: Enhances draugr voices to sound scarier & more zombie - like.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][size=3]Enhanced draugr voices. They were remastered to sound more like real zombies, not just creepy old men.Â 
[/size][/font][/center][center][size=3][font=Tahoma]WARNING: This mod will make you shit your pants in dungeons...
[/font]Compatible with ALL sound overhauls, except for ones that alter draugr voices, obviously...

[/size][size=5]I made a new mod for Beasts in Skyrim, check it out here:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58554/?[/size][/center][font=Tahoma]
[/font][center][font=Tahoma][size=3]Have fun![/size]
